work.name: TrafficLight de México
work.description: TrafficLight de México is a Mexican company specializing in innovative engineering solutions primarily focused on public space functionality, energy, and mobility. They aim to transform public spaces to make them more efficient and user-friendly by utilizing creative engineering and data management. Their projects often integrate artistic and technical elements to enhance both the aesthetics and sustainability of urban environments
